thread.title: Rocco Albano
thread.title_full: France Off the Beaten Path reviewed by Rocco Albano

author: Rocco Albano
title: Rocco Albano
text: From the first moment arriving we were met by David who was most friendly and helpful since I had a slight fall from the train. He took us to the Pharmacy where I received prompt medication. The next week was filled with lavender, walks through the vineyards and lots of great food as well as great conversations. It is managed at your leisure and not at a harried pace. Our group bonded nicely. It is a must to mention Phillipe. He worked with David and together they made us want to go again on another tour. After being on many trips, this is the one you want. Please consider, "France Off The Beaten Path". Do it now.
